fields.label: Page Title Text
fields.name: page_title_text
fields.instructions: This is the text field of the orange banner area.

fields.label: Page Title Image
fields.name: page_title_image
fields.instructions: This is the image that would display to the left of the text in the orange banner area.

fields.label: Pinned Nav CTA 1 Text
fields.name: pinned_nav_cta_1_text
fields.instructions: Video Demo, Product Guide, etc. Less than 16 characters. Longer text may wrap on mobile devices.

fields.label: Pinned Nav CTA 1 Link
fields.name: pinned_nav_cta_1_link
fields.instructions: Please enter the url of the video you are linking to.

fields.label: Pinned Nav CTA 1 Icon
fields.name: pinned_nav_cta_1_icon
fields.instructions:
For this field, please use and icon via font awesome. http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/

Clicking an icon will give you the code to paste into this field.

fields.label: Pinned Nav CTA 2 Link
fields.name: pinned_nav_cta_2_link
fields.instructions: Please enter the url of the video you are linking to.

fields.label: Pinned Nav CTA 2 Icon
fields.name: pinned_nav_cta_2_icon
fields.instructions:
For this field, please use and icon via font awesome. http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/icons/

Clicking an icon will give you the code to paste into this field.

fields.label: Banner Image
fields.name: products_overview_banner_image
fields.instructions: This is the image behind the yellow text in the banner area.

fields.label: Banner Text
fields.name: products_banner_text
fields.instructions: This is the large yellow text at the top of the page.

fields.label: Banner Link Text
fields.name: products_banner_cta_text
fields.instructions: This is the text for the CTA button under the yellow text at the top of the page.

fields.label: Banner Link Location
fields.name: products_banner_cta_link
fields.instructions: Use this field to select the location that you would like your button to link to.

sub_fields.label: Logo Graphic
sub_fields.name: logo_graphic
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended size: 125 x 125px

fields.label: Overview Left Icon
fields.name: overview_left_icon
fields.instructions: Use this field to add an icon or graphic over the top of text on the left hand side of the products overview area.

fields.label: Overview Left Headline
fields.name: overview_left_headline
fields.instructions: This is the headline for the left hand side of your overview area. (Ideally this would be about 35 characters or less.)

fields.label: Overview Left Content
fields.name: overview_left_content
fields.instructions: This is the content for the left hand side of your overview area. (Ideally this would be about 325 characters or less.)

fields.label: Overview Right Image
fields.name: overview_right_image
fields.instructions:
This field is used for the large image on the righthand side of the overview area. 

This image should be approximately 1024px x 690px.

fields.label: Overview Features
fields.name: overview_features
fields.instructions: This is used for the four featured callouts of the overview area.

sub_fields.label: Overview Feature's Icon
sub_fields.name: overview_features_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Please select or upload the icon you would like for this featured item.

sub_fields.label: Overview Feature's Icon Alt Tag
sub_fields.name: overview_features_icon_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Please add an alternative description for this icon.

sub_fields.label: Overview Feature's Headline
sub_fields.name: overview_features_headline
sub_fields.instructions: Blue, linked headline text for your featured item.

sub_fields.label: Overview Feature's Content
sub_fields.name: overview_features_content
sub_fields.instructions: Text about your featured item.

sub_fields.label: Products Section Sub Navigation
sub_fields.name: section_text
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter the name of the section you are creating. e.g. Benefits Administration. (These will be used for navigating to the main sections of the page.)

sub_fields.label: Link Location
sub_fields.name: link_location
sub_fields.instructions: Please repeat the name of the link with no spaces. Please use dashes for spaces if needed. e.g. Benefits-Administration

sub_fields.label: Product Icon
sub_fields.name: product_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Icon for above text area (not required).

sub_fields.label: Product Icon Alt Text
sub_fields.name: product_icon_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter alt text for the icon.

sub_fields.label: Product Headline
sub_fields.name: product_headline
sub_fields.instructions: Headline for the product opening content

sub_fields.label: Product Content
sub_fields.name: product_content
sub_fields.instructions: Brief overview paragraph of the product.

sub_fields.label: Modal Details
sub_fields.name: modal_type
sub_fields.instructions: Chose if this image will link to a modal box image or video.

sub_fields.label: Product Image
sub_fields.name: product_image
sub_fields.instructions:
Please select an image or screenshot of your product.

This image should be approximately 560px x 380px or larger.

sub_fields.label: Product Image Alt
sub_fields.name: product_image_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter alt text for the icon.

sub_fields.label: Modal Image
sub_fields.name: modal_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image should be approximately 1024px x 690px or larger.

sub_fields.label: Modal Video URL
sub_fields.name: modal_video_url
sub_fields.instructions: ex: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zz2SUE5o5nI

sub_fields.label: Related Content Columns
sub_fields.name: related_content_columns
sub_fields.instructions: Do you want to use extra content columns?

sub_fields.label: Related Content Column 1
sub_fields.name: related_content_column1
sub_fields.instructions: This is used for the first of a two column layout under the opening paragraph

sub_fields.label: Related Content Column 2
sub_fields.name: related_content_column2
sub_fields.instructions: This is used for the second of a two column layout under the opening paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Product Features
sub_fields.name: product_features
sub_fields.instructions: These are the four features listed across the bottom of some of the sections.

sub_fields.label: Products Section Sub Navigation
sub_fields.name: section_text
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter the name of the section you are creating. e.g. Benefits Administration. (These will be used for navigating to the main sections of the page.)

sub_fields.label: Link Location
sub_fields.name: link_location
sub_fields.instructions: Please repeat the name of the link with no spaces. Please use dashes for spaces if needed. e.g. Benefits-Administration

sub_fields.label: Product Icon
sub_fields.name: product_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Icon for above text area (not required).

sub_fields.label: Product Icon Alt Text
sub_fields.name: product_icon_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Please enter alt text for the icon.

sub_fields.label: Product Headline
sub_fields.name: product_headline
sub_fields.instructions: Headline for the product opening content

sub_fields.label: Product Content
sub_fields.name: product_content
sub_fields.instructions: Brief overview paragraph of the product.

sub_fields.label: Related Content Headline
sub_fields.name: related_content_headline
sub_fields.instructions: Headline of right side content

sub_fields.label: Related Content
sub_fields.name: related_content
sub_fields.instructions: Brief overview paragraph for related content area.

sub_fields.label: Related Content Column 1
sub_fields.name: related_content_column1
sub_fields.instructions: This is used for the first of a two column layout under the opening paragraph

sub_fields.label: Related Content Column 2
sub_fields.name: related_content_column2
sub_fields.instructions: This is used for the second of a two column layout under the opening paragraph.

sub_fields.label: Product Features
sub_fields.name: product_features
sub_fields.instructions: These are the four features listed across the bottom of some of the sections.

sub_fields.label: Enhancements Header
sub_fields.name: enhancements_header
sub_fields.instructions: Large, centered text over the Enhancements area.

sub_fields.label: Enhancements Features
sub_fields.name: enhancements_features
sub_fields.instructions: Features of the enhancements area (4 columns)

sub_fields.label: Enhancements CTA Text
sub_fields.name: enhancements_cta_text
sub_fields.instructions: Call to Action text for the button.

fields.label: Related Articles
fields.name: product_related_article
fields.instructions: Blue section at the bottom. Ideally this will have three related articles.

sub_fields.label: Related Article Source
sub_fields.name: product_related_article_source
sub_fields.instructions: Event, Blog etc.

sub_fields.label: Article Title
sub_fields.name: product_related_article_title
sub_fields.instructions: Title of the related article

sub_fields.label: Article Content
sub_fields.name: product_related_article_content
sub_fields.instructions: Please add the first sentence of your article.

sub_fields.label: Article Link Text
sub_fields.name: product_related_article_linked_text
sub_fields.instructions: Keep in mind that if possible, linking key words is more beneficial to SEO than, "read more".

sub_fields.label: Article Link Location
sub_fields.name: product_related_article_link
sub_fields.instructions: Please add the url of the page you would like to link your text to.
